title: Noted Surgeon Dr Mathew Varghese Named 'The One International'
content: Noted orthopaedic surgeon Dr Mathew Varghese was named The One International at the prestigious The One gala dinner and award ceremony in Hong Kong.
summary: Noted orthopaedic surgeon Dr Mathew Varghese was named The One International at the prestigious The One gala dinner and award ceremony in Hong Kong.

title: South Korea Court Jails Ex-Fiance Of Olympic Medalist For 13 Years
content: A South Korean appellate court on Thursday sentenced a former fiance of Olympic fencing medalist Nam Hyun-hee to 13 years in prison for swindling dozens of people out of more than 3.5 billion won ($2.5 million) under the guise of a chaebol heir.
summary: A South Korean appellate court on Thursday sentenced a former fiance of Olympic fencing medalist Nam Hyun-hee to 13 years in prison for swindling dozens of people out of more than 3.5 billion won ($2.5 million) under the guise of a chaebol heir.

title: Trump Pick Matt Gaetz Withdraws As Nominee For US Attorney General
content: Scandal-plagued Matt Gaetz, who was nominated by President-elect Donald Trump to be US attorney general, on Thursday pulled out of the confirmation process in an early setback for the incoming administration.
summary: Scandal-plagued Matt Gaetz, who was nominated by President-elect Donald Trump to be US attorney general, on Thursday pulled out of the confirmation process in an early setback for the incoming administration.

title: "Dark Moment": Israeli Envoy On World Court's 'Arrest Netanyahu Order'
content: The International Criminal Court's move to issue arrest warrants for Israeli Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu and defence minister Yoav Gallant is a "dark moment" for the court, Israel's Ambassador to India Reuven Azar has said.
summary: The International Criminal Court's move to issue arrest warrants for Israeli Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu and defence minister Yoav Gallant is a "dark moment" for the court, Israel's Ambassador to India Reuven Azar has said.

title: UN Calls Use Of New Russian Missile In Ukraine "Worrying"
content: Russia's use of a new medium-range ballistic missile to strike Ukraine was a "worrying development," the spokesman for UN Secretary-General Antonio Guterres said Thursday.
summary: Russia's use of a new medium-range ballistic missile to strike Ukraine was a "worrying development," the spokesman for UN Secretary-General Antonio Guterres said Thursday.

title: All Countries Reject Climate Finance Draft Leaving COP29 In Crisis
content: A draft text released early Thursday on a new climate finance package for the developing world was rejected by every single country signatory to the UN climate convention.
summary: A draft text released early Thursday on a new climate finance package for the developing world was rejected by every single country signatory to the UN climate convention.

title: Putin Says Russia Hit Ukraine With New Mid-Range Ballistic Missile
content: Russian President Vladimir Putin said Thursday that the country's forces had hit Ukraine with a new mid-range ballistic missile.
summary: Russian President Vladimir Putin said Thursday that the country's forces had hit Ukraine with a new mid-range ballistic missile.

title: Indian Army Chief Bestowed With Rank Of Honourary General Of Nepalese Army
content: Showcasing the strong ties between the two countries, Indian Army Chief General Upendra Dwivedi was on Thursday conferred with the prestigious rank of Honourary General of the Nepalese Army.
summary: Showcasing the strong ties between the two countries, Indian Army Chief General Upendra Dwivedi was on Thursday conferred with the prestigious rank of Honourary General of the Nepalese Army.

title: Global Leaders Split As World Court Issues Arrest Warrant For Netanyahu
content: Israel and its allies denounced the International Criminal Court's decision to issue an arrest warrant Thursday for Israeli Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu, even as Turkey -- and rights groups - welcomed the move.
summary: Israel and its allies denounced the International Criminal Court's decision to issue an arrest warrant Thursday for Israeli Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu, even as Turkey -- and rights groups - welcomed the move.

title: Russia Puts US Base In Poland On Priority List For "Potential Elimination"
content: A US ballistic missile defence base in Poland, which may 'lead to an increase in the overall level of nuclear danger', is now on Russia's target list for possible destruction is needed, Moscow confirmed.
summary: A US ballistic missile defence base in Poland, which may 'lead to an increase in the overall level of nuclear danger', is now on Russia's target list for possible destruction is needed, Moscow confirmed.

title: "Have Right To Strike...": Putin's Veiled Warning To US, UK
content: Russian President Vladimir Putin said Thursday that Moscow has the right to strike military targets of countries whose weapons are used by Ukraine to hit Russian territory.
summary: Russian President Vladimir Putin said Thursday that Moscow has the right to strike military targets of countries whose weapons are used by Ukraine to hit Russian territory.

title: Gaza Has Become 'Graveyard' For Children, Says UN Palestinian Agency Chief
content: Philippe Lazzarini, Commissioner-General of the United Nations Relief and Works Agency for Palestine Refugees in the Near East (UNRWA), said that Gaza has become a 'graveyard' for children.
summary: Philippe Lazzarini, Commissioner-General of the United Nations Relief and Works Agency for Palestine Refugees in the Near East (UNRWA), said that Gaza has become a 'graveyard' for children.

title: Russian Missile Used On Ukraine Not An ICBM, Says US Official: Report
content: Russia's strike on Ukraine was not an ICBM, but an "experimental" medium-range ballistic missile, a US official said Thursday, playing down the significance of the attack.
summary: Russia's strike on Ukraine was not an ICBM, but an "experimental" medium-range ballistic missile, a US official said Thursday, playing down the significance of the attack.

title: Trump Pick Matt Gaetz Withdraws As Nominee For US Attorney General
content: Matt Gaetz, who was nominated by President-elect Donald Trump to be US attorney general, on Thursday pulled out of the selection process after widespread opposition including from within his Republican Party.
summary: Matt Gaetz, who was nominated by President-elect Donald Trump to be US attorney general, on Thursday pulled out of the selection process after widespread opposition including from within his Republican Party.

title: Explained: How Australia's Social Media Ban For Under 16s Will Be Imposed
content: Communications Minister Michelle Rowland says platforms like TikTok, Facebook, Snapchat, Reddit, X and Instagram fall under the umbrella of the law.
summary: Communications Minister Michelle Rowland says platforms like TikTok, Facebook, Snapchat, Reddit, X and Instagram fall under the umbrella of the law.

title: This Asian City Is Emerging As Sex Tourism Hub. It's Not Where You Think
content: In the golden years, this city witnessed a significant economic boom. It remains one of the most liveable cities in the world, a financial power hub and also an emerging city for sex tourism, with men wandering on the streets, looking for women.
summary: In the golden years, this city witnessed a significant economic boom. It remains one of the most liveable cities in the world, a financial power hub and also an emerging city for sex tourism, with men wandering on the streets, looking for women.

title: US 'Fundamentally Rejects' World Court Warrant For Israel PM: White House
content: The United States "fundamentally rejects" a decision by the International Criminal Court to issue arrest warrants for Israeli Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu and former defense minister Yoav Gallant, the White House said Thursday.
summary: The United States "fundamentally rejects" a decision by the International Criminal Court to issue arrest warrants for Israeli Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu and former defense minister Yoav Gallant, the White House said Thursday.

title: "Cooperation, Not Conflict": PM Says Democracy, Not Expansionism Is The Way
content: In a historic moment, Prime Minister Narendra Modi addressed the Parliament in Guyana today. He is the first Indian prime minister in 56 years to visit the Caribbean nation.
summary: In a historic moment, Prime Minister Narendra Modi addressed the Parliament in Guyana today. He is the first Indian prime minister in 56 years to visit the Caribbean nation.

title: Trans Woman In China Wins Record Payout After Forced Electroshock Therapy
content: Linger endured 97 days of hospitalisation and was subjected to seven sessions of electroshock therapy during her stay.
summary: Linger endured 97 days of hospitalisation and was subjected to seven sessions of electroshock therapy during her stay.

title: The Rich Tradition Of 'Chutney' And 'Chutney Music' In Caribbean Nations
content: Chutney music is a vibrant fusion of Indian folk music, primarily Bhojpuri, with the infectious rhythms of Caribbean calypso and soca.
summary: Chutney music is a vibrant fusion of Indian folk music, primarily Bhojpuri, with the infectious rhythms of Caribbean calypso and soca.
